entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then cloudy. Blowing snow at times. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
